parameters: Text = "Freeze them to silence deeper than death.\n\\c[1]Fr…
Text = "This should be the treasure location..."
There isn't any special request right now.
There isn't any special request right now.
I wonder if there are any Gold here.
Hello, why are you standing here?
Ara, there's a human who can see me?
It's been a long time since a human see me.
You're the first one in hundred years.
Or should I say in this game I'm a \c[1]Guide\c[0].
Hey Alto, why are you talking to a wall?
Did you want to ask something?
Ara, what kind of tips did you want to know?
If you want to unlock Main Quest, you should collect some money first!
Is this really related, Miss Gabriel?
You need to collect at least \c[14]1,500\G\c[0] to unlock Arc 1!
\c[5]Hint\c[0]: If you visit a certain grave for 3 times, you may found something useful?
Did you feel that you lacks of Skills?
You can learn Skills by accessing the Skill Menu.
Learning Skill requires Skill Points (SP), and SP gained by leveling up.
Each level up grants \c[14]5\c[0] SP, so carefully learn Skills that you need.
Oh, as an extra, if you learn all Skills, you may unlock a certain powerful Skill.
Did you know that you can use certain items such as \c[6]Potion\c[0] in \c[4]Item\c[0] Menu?
Did you need some extra boosts to your stats?

You can purchase these equipments from \c[6]Julia\c[0].
You can view your statuses in \c[4]Status\c[0] Menu.
Did you know that you can view your quests information in Quest Menu?
You also can change the current tracked quest in the same menu.
